metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Victor Jara Group
metadata.description: Antonio Guzman interviews Carlos Paiz on his organization, EISA, which helps Central and South American immigrants integrate society in Edmonton. Nosotros presents a documentary by Alipio Vera entitled la Pobresa en Chile (Poverty in Chile). The Victor Jara group presents folk dances from northern Chile.
metadata.subject: Carlos Paiz; EISA; Servicios para Inmigrantes en Edmonton; Poverty; Chile; Victor Jara; Festival Laser
